casa_mia.name: Casa Mia
casa_mia.introduction: Welcome to Casa Mia Senior Living, a warm and welcoming community dedicated to providing exceptional care and enriching experiences for our residents. As a MEDIC Foundation volunteer, you play a vital role in brightening the lives of our senior community members through meaningful connections and engaging activities.
checklist: Review facility safety protocols and emergency procedures
Familiarize yourself with resident activity preferences
Sign in at reception desk before each visit
